channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2024-0102|2024-08-08T18:13:14.960Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in nvdisasm, where an attacker can cause an out-of-bounds read issue by deceiving a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0072|2024-08-01T17:41:15.878Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0076|2024-08-01T17:41:15.939Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.
